snippet.title: New Super Mario Bros. Wii: The Galaxy Expansion - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
New Super Mario Bros. Wii: The Galaxy Expansion is a moderately sized mod for Newer SMBW that adds levels themed entirely on Super Mario Galaxy and Super Mario Galaxy 2 galaxies. It is planned to release in 2023.

The Buoy Base Galaxy, Cloudy Court Galaxy and Toy Time Galaxy videos previously uploaded to this channel are showcases of levels in this mod. 

The Comet Medal import over Star Coins was created by G4L, not me. I, Acing, created all tilesets, stage layouts etc. except for anything created by Newer Team. All tilesets, stage layouts, music, models etc. are subject to change in future. The stage order shown is also not accurate to the final game.

One thing not shown in this trailer is the world map - It has not been created yet, however it will be fully custom. 

https://twitter.com/AcingSpl
